The shots hit and forced Dreadplague to transform. However, it seemed 
that her techno-organic 2 organism was far more resilient than that 
of normal transformers. She soaked the damage easily as she became a 
cloaked figure again. She drew her sword and simply plunged it 
towards Perceptor's core.

Dreadplague: You are tough, I must admit it, but not enough for me.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor was scratched for the talons and he opened a close fire 
> against Dreadplague 25 times
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Even though the shot hit, and hard, Dreadplague focused to remain 
> > where she was. She tried to dig her talons under Perceptor's 
armor 
> > plating and to twist it open.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Perceptor:
> > > 
> > > "THEN TAKE THIS!!!!!" said the male, who barely could avoid her

> > >

> > >

> the 
> > > > second exploded near her tail. She rapidly transformed to 
> wyvern 
> > > mode 
> > > > and plainly landed on top of Perceptor. She started battering 
> him 
> > > > with her musclular tail.
> > > > 
> > > > Dread: Yes! I am a witch! I am the witch! The Witch-Queen!
> > > >

> mode.

> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Dread: Die, Predagoon!
